ygData.authorName: I can catch the moon in my hand
ygData.from: I can catch the moon in my hand <douglas@...>
ygData.subject: Re: Post awhile back on Crafted Locations
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Heh - they very well might be; however, the only way to get the werewolves is to deal with the 30-35th level ancilles. =) -- We cross our bridges when we
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 1 Sep 1999, Doug Sorensen wrote:

> From: Doug Sorensen <belgarth_of_surefall@...>
>
> I have been told the Werewolves of Mistmoore are about
> Level 28.

Heh - they very well might be; however, the only way to get the
werewolves is to deal with the 30-35th level ancilles. =)
--
We cross our bridges when we come to them and burn them behind us,
with nothing to show for our progress but the memory of the smell
of smoke and the presumption that once our eyes watered.
